TREATMENT FOR KIT NO. 6
“THREE INCHES FROM LEARNING (The High School Teacher
and the Television Lesson)
(NOTE: This film parallels the film for Kit No. 5, in that their
purposes are the same, and their content-time schedules are
similar. However, it is planned that Kit No. 5 will be de¬
voted entirely to utilization of the television lesson by
the teacher in the elementary classroom. This film for
Kit No. 6 will concern itself with utilization of the tele¬
vision lesson in the high school classroom (with Implications
for the junior high school classroom)...with attention to some
of the factors influencing the use of television in these more
advanced learning situations...factors which are absent from
the elementary classroom experience.
Here, again, the Project Committee feels that any detailed
treatment must await the final choice of an outstanding high
school teacher as consultant, and that the details of the film
should be patterned upon that teacher's individual approach to
utilization of the television lesson in a particular situation.
It has been suggested by the Committee that a good topic for
the Kit No. 6 television lesson would be WORLD CULTURES.)
